overview: A group of stellar transvestites have invaded the planet, Laura Crawford - a lethal hybrid formed by the worst of man and woman - has been able to lead both sexes to chaos and mutual contempt. Barbara Furiasse, the last living heterosexual on earth, is about to vanish, and with it the hope of a future world. She has only three days to find a real man and together flee from the transvestite invasion.
title: Invasión Travesti
